#import <CPPlot.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

(NSUInteger) - numberOfRecordsForPlot:
 The number of data points for the plot.
(NSRange) - recordIndexRangeForPlot:plotRange:
 Determines the record index range corresponding to a given range of data. This method is optional. If the method is implemented, it could improve performance in data sets that are only partially displayed.
Implement one of the following

(NSArray *) - numbersForPlot:field:recordIndexRange:
 Gets a range of plot data for the given plot and field.
(NSNumber *) - numberForPlot:field:recordIndex:
 Gets a plot data value for the given plot and field.

Detailed Description

A plot data source.

field: (NSUInteger)  fieldEnum
recordIndexRange: (NSRange)  indexRange 

Gets a range of plot data for the given plot and field.

Parameters:
plot The plot.

Returns:

- (NSRange) recordIndexRangeForPlot: (CPPlot *)  plot
plotRange: (CPPlotRange *)  plotRange 

Determines the record index range corresponding to a given range of data. This method is optional. If the method is implemented, it could improve performance in data sets that are only partially displayed.

Parameters:
plot The plot.
plotRange The range expressed in data values.
Returns:
The range of record indexes.
